doc.field: F Y E f6183reute u f BC-ASAMERA-ASM>-TO-SELL 03-17 0044
ASAMERA ASM> TO SELL DENVER REFINERY

Asamera Inc said it has signed a letter of intent to sell its Denver refinery to Total Petroleum (North America) Ltd TPN> for undisclosed terms. It said the sale is subject to regulatory approval. Reuter
